errorCreatingUser: Hari ikibazo cyavutse mu gihe cyo kurema ukoresha
loginRequired: Ugomba kwinjira kugira ngo usibe abakoresha
errorDeletingAllUsers: Hari ikibazo mu gusiba abakoresha bose
errorUploadingFile: Hari ikibazo cyavutse mu gihe cyo kohereza dosiye
mustBeLoggedInToUploadFiles: Ugomba kwinjira kugira ngo wohereze dosiye
errorSavingFileToDatabase: Hari ikibazo mu kubika dosiye muri databazi
mustBeLoggedInToViewFiles: Ugomba kwinjira kugira ngo urebe dosiye zawe
errorGettingUserFiles: Hari ikibazo mu kubona dosiye z'umukoresha
mustBeLoggedInToDeleteFiles: Ugomba kwinjira kugira ngo usibe dosiye
errorDeletingAllFiles: Hari ikibazo mu gusiba dosiye zose
